subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Alain Bernard of France broke the world record in the 100-meter freestyle at the French championships in Montpellier, becoming the first swimmer to go under 47 seconds. He won his semifinal race in 46.94, beating the record of 47.05 set by the Australian Eamon Sullivan in the Beijing Olympics.
